name: Make America Glow Again
description:
Can you defend your cities from waves of missiles in the vein of classic arcade games like Missile Command?

Conserve your stockpiles by destroying multiple missiles with a single interceptor. At every successful wave you are rewarded with a wise quote from the reality television president. 

It's time to Make America Glow Again.

Instructions:

Press ESC key for Quit menu at any time if you are in full screen mode.

Use mouse to shoot your THAD defense missiles and destroy incoming nukes before they destroy your cities!
